item.title: Comment on La ciudad lineal by Raghu Parthasarathy
item.description:
The best reason to build a city on a line is to maximize the time, expense, and inconvenience of transportation between arbitrary points. The second best reason is that you've got tons of money, zero understanding of geometry, and a political system that doesn't tolerate criticism.
